title: How is the MSc in life sciences at Presidency University? - Quora

response.answer_text: Earlier Presidency College used to have separate Departments of Botany, Zoology, Physiology, Biochemistry (Part of Chemistry). After Presidency University was formed, the merged Life Science Department was formed but many of the renowned Professors left. With new group of younger staff, the quality of teaching is yet to achieve its past glory. However, PU is a good choice.
